articles.author: Heather Kelly
articles.title: How to see your ratings from Uber drivers, and be a better passenger - The Washington Post
articles.description: Your Uber drivers have been rating you for years. A new option in the app lets you see how many 1 star ratings you've received.
articles.content:
Story continues below advertisement
